links.*: The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion
The Lord of the Rings: Conquest
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)
The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[1 January|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] resigns as Governor of [[King Edward's School]], [[Birmingham]]. 
* '''[[2 January|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 41]].
* '''[[12 January|12]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 42]].
* '''[[26 January|26]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 42a]].
==February==
* '''[[1 February|1]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 42b]].
==March==
* '''[[6 March|6]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] starts writing [[letter 43]].
* '''[[12 March|12]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 43a]].
* '''[[18 March|18]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 44]].
==April==
* '''[[30 April|30]]''' - [[Sean Arnold]], who would play [[Odo Proudfoot]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]], is born.

==June==
* '''[[9 June|9]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 45]].
==August==
* '''[[4 August|4]]''' - [[Martin Jarvis]], who would voice [[Gandalf]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Conquest]]'', is born.

==October==

* '''[[1 October|1]]''' - Author [[Glen GoodKnight]] is born.

==November==
* '''[[18 November|18]]''' - [[David Hemmings]], who would play [[Bergil]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1955 radio series)]], is born.
* '''[[26 November|26]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 46]].
==December==
* '''[[10 December|10]]''' - [[Baillie Tolkien]] is born.
* '''[[22 December|22]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
* '''[[24 December|24]]''' - Father Christmas writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.

==?==
* '''?''' - [[Ian Mune]], who played a [[shirriffs|bounder]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', is born.

==Note==
While writing ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', Tolkien modelled the [[moon|lunar]] phases of {{TA|3018}} on those of this year, with an offset of +5/6 days.<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. xlvi</ref>
{{Years|1938|1939|1940|1941|1942|1943|1944|}}
{{references}}
